column5: Wall, I reckon, to get our safety record up, we jail anyone caught with a handgun for 10 years, no and, if , or buts. I bet you'd see the illegal handguns disappear perty quick.  What do you think?
First the helet law and now the handguns Paul. Looking for an earlier spring Bud?

Look south, we would have so many more people in prison the rest working 24/7 couldn`t pay enough  taxes to support them.  Is free room and board to people that don`t want to work any way a deterant? A badge certainly isn`t!
Legal handguns have never been a problem...imported ones have been. Laws only restrict law abiding citizens. Glad to here its still pretty good here. people should take pride in that.
This thread, as well as two others tonight have clearly been posted to promote anger. I haven't spoken to the other mods so they might want to resurect this thread.
